      • setDialogTransparency

        public static android.app.Dialog setDialogTransparency(android.app.Dialog dialog,
                                                       float percentOutOf100)
        Set the dialog transparency
        Parameters:
        dialog - Dialog to alter
        percentOutOf100 - Percent of Transparency. if 0 is passed, not transparent at all. If 100 is passed, completely transparent. Pass values from 0 - 100.
        Returns:

      • buildTimePicker

        public static android.app.TimePickerDialog buildTimePicker(android.content.Context context,
                                                           android.app.TimePickerDialog.OnTimeSetListener tsl,
                                                           @Nullable
                                                           java.lang.Integer hourStart,
                                                           @Nullable
                                                           java.lang.Integer minuteStart,
                                                           @Nullable
                                                           java.lang.Boolean is24Hour,
                                                           @Nullable
                                                           java.lang.Integer hourInterval,
                                                           @Nullable
                                                           java.lang.Integer minuteInterval)
        Build a Timer Picker Dialog with custom intervals
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        tsl - TimePickerDialog.OnTimeSetListener
        hourStart - Hours to start at. If null, if 24 hour, starts at 0, else, starts at 1.
        minuteStart - Minutes to start at. If null, defaults to 0
        is24Hour - If null is passed, it will attempt to get system preferred. If it cannot grab that, it will default to false and show 12 hour format.
        hourInterval - Hour interval. IE, if you send 4, it would only show 4, 8, 12, etc.
        minuteInterval - Minute Interval. IE, if you send 30, it would only show 30, 0.
        Returns:
        CustomTimePickerDialog
